ABOUT_ME.ABOUT_1: Took my first steps in programming in 2019 while still in school; in 2021, after graduating, I focused on web development

ABOUT_ME.ABOUT_3: I enjoy playing chess, solving Rubik's cubes, and listening to a lot of uncommon music for people of my age
